Submitter Information: Progenika Biopharma S.A., a Grifols Company
Analyte(s): Alpha-1 antitrypsin allelic variants (c.187C>T, c.194T>C, c.226_228delTTC, c.230C>T, c.552delC, c.646+1G>T, c.721A>T, c.739C>T, c.839A>T, c.863A>T, c.1096G>A, c.1130dupT, c.1158dupC, c.1178C>T)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Progenika A1AT Genotyping Test using multiplex PCR and probe hybridization on Luminex platform to identify 14 SERPINA1 gene variants for alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency diagnosis.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative PCR and hybridization-based in vitro test to detect and identify 14 SERPINA1 gene variants in genomic DNA from whole blood (DBS or K2-EDTA) as an aid in diagnosing individuals with alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency (A1ATD), used with clinical findings and other laboratory tests.
